name: Hentai Mahjong: Long Day
description:
Hentai mahjong: long day - In this mahjong connect game you have to spend a day with a beautiful girl. Connect pairs of things to clear the playing field and go to your friend's next destination. Help her with her daily routine and who knows what will await you as a reward for your efforts in the evening ...


Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
